I am only downloading this as a close, personal kick in the nuts to Crispin Glover, who I only know as someone who locks himself in his room doing cocaine and refuses to make the appearance he's contracted for until he gets more money. (I'm betting this has happened a lot from the fit he threw.... it was like he was painting by the numbers.)
Once upon a time in the '90s, I agreed to take Crispin to Disney World and show him around while he tripped, but he cancelled at the last minute. He is a great artist, but kind of flaky...
